br.usp.ime.graphreport
Class GraphReporter

java.lang.Object
  br.usp.ime.graphreport.GraphReporter

public class GraphReporter
extends java.lang.Object

Generates several reports on an evolving graph. For more information on the reports, check http://grenoble.ime.usp.br/~paulo/dtn/services.html

Author:
Paulo Henrique Floriano
